thread.title: Bon Jovi's evolution continues with 'This House Is Not for Sale' album and tour (review, photos)
thread.title_full: Bon Jovi's evolution continues with 'This House Is Not for Sale' album and tour (review, photos)

author: Chuck Yarborough, The Plain Dealer
title: Bon Jovi's evolution continues with 'This House Is Not for Sale' album and tour (review, photos)
text: Bon Jovi returned to Northeast Ohio Sunday night with a show that was heavy on the venerable band's newest album, "This House Is Not for Sale.'' Minus the flash of former guitarist Richie Sambora and with lead singer and namesake Jon Bon Jovi's voice mellowing, the band is building a new chapter in its storied career.
